Key Match Events: Juan Soto doubled in the automatic runner in the bottom of the 10th inning
Pre-Game Insights: The Red Sox pushed an American League East opponent into extra innings for the second night in a row.
Post-Match Reflections: The Red Sox are 7-13 in their last 20 games, 14-21 in the last 35 and 21-30 in 51 games since the All-Star break. There are 15 games left in the season.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Red Sox wasted a chance to make up ground in the wild-card race.
Detroit lost to Colorado and Kansas City and Minnesota were idle on the same day.
